mdRecord.dcterms:title: (E)-5618-Home of Washington, memorial of the Republic's founder, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the east front of the Mansion at Mount Vernon. View includes the south porch and visitors lounging on benches on the east lawn. Note the workers on scaffolding next to the Mansion piazza. Mounted on gray board. Publisher's imprint on the front of the cardboard mount reads: European Publishers Underwood & Underwood (London) Ltd., Underwood & Underwood, Sun Sculpture trademark, New York & Ottawa, Kas. Works Arlington, N. J. (S 143). Title - (E)-5618-Home of Washington, memorial of the Republic's founder, Mount Vernon, Va. Copyright Underwood & Underwood. The reverse of the mount includes a brief history of Mount Vernon. A history of the estate is printed directly onto the back of mount. Titles of the stereograph are printed in English, French, German, Spanish, Swedish and Russian.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
